episodes.title: The State of AI Agents in 2025 & How to Use Them
episodes.description:
Want our guide to master AI Agents? Get it here: https://clickhubspot.com/bka

Episode 76: What actually makes something a real "AI Agent"—and how close are we to AI handling complex work entirely on its own? Matt Wolfe (https://x.com/mreflow) is joined by Deepak Singh (https://x.com/mndoci), Vice President at AWS and leader of Amazon’s Agentic AI infrastructure teams. With over 17 years at Amazon and a PhD in theoretical chemistry, Deepak brings unparalleled insights into the development and fu
episodes.feed_name: The Next Wave - AI and The Future of Technology
